cards.rules_text:
When Sorin, Last to Fall is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it had a loyalty counter on it, return it to the battlefield with one fewer loyalty counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to Sorin, Last to Fall, sacrifice him.
[+1]: Sorin, Last to Fall deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life.

cards.rules_text:

[-3]: Add {R}{R}{R}.
[-5]: Exile the top five cards of your library. You may play cards from among them until the end of your next turn.

[-7]: Each creature you control fights a creature an opponent controls.

cards.rules_text: You can't cast noncreature spells.

Mutate {0} [i](If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
If you would draw a card for the first time each turn, investigate instead. [i](To investigate, create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Whenever a land you control enters, exile it and create a Treasure token.
You can't cast creature spells.
Whenever you tap a land for mana, put a stun counter on it.
You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game.

Trample
{1}{G}: Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability you don't control that targets Gore Tyrant. Draw a card. You may activate this ability while Gore Tyrant is a spell.
{T}: Add {C}.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal three white cards from your hand.
Target opponent gets a three-time boon with “Whenever you cast a spell, counter it unless you pay {1}.”

As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal three blue cards from your hand.
Draw three cards.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal three black cards from your hand.
Target opponent discards three cards.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal three red cards from your hand.
Add {R}{R}{R}.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal three green cards from your hand.
Return three target cards from your graveyard to your hand.

When you cast Simplicity Core, scry 1, then draw a card.
Land cards you own are basic.

Lunar Wastes enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
Other lands gain “{T}, Tap an untapped land you control: Add one mana of any color.” and lose all other abilities.

When Warring Terrain enters, you may sacrifice it. When you do, destroy target land. If that land was basic, you lose 2 life.
{T}: Add {C}.

Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You draw seven cards. Each opponent looks at the top seven cards of their library and puts five of them into their hand and the rest on the bottom of their library in any order.

Hexproof, indestructible
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: Add four mana of any one color.
If you control another land, sacrifice Bloodstained Tower.

Surveil 3.
Any time you could mulligan and Serum Probe is in your hand, if your hand has no land cards in it, you may reveal all the cards in your hand, then exile Serum Probe, shuffle the rest into your deck, and draw six cards. [i](You can do this in addition to taking mulligans.)[/i]

When Ruining Terrain enters, you may sacrifice it. When you do, destroy target artifact. If that artifact had a mana ability, you lose 2 life.
{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {W}.
A deck can't have more than one card named Refined Mox Pearl.

{T}: Add {U}.
A deck can't have more than one card named Refined Mox Sapphire.

{T}: Add {B}.
A deck can't have more than one card named Refined Mox Jet.

{T}: Add {R}.
A deck can't have more than one card named Refined Mox Ruby.

{T}: Add {G}.
A deck can't have more than one card named Refined Mox Emerald.

Counter target activated ability, triggered ability, or instant spell.
Surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]

You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target activated or triggered ability.
Put a nullification counter on target nonland permanent. [i](A permanent with a nullification counter loses all abilities.)[/i]

You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Until end of turn, target creature gains “When this creature dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, return it to its the battlefield tapped with a +1/+1 counter.”

If it's not your turn, you may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

If it's not your turn, you may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target noncreature spell.

If it's not your turn, you may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target opponent can't cast spells or attack this turn.

If it's not your turn, you may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell. Its controller may discover X, where X is that spell's mana value. [i](To discover X, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value X or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]

You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Voidforce of Fire deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker.

If it's not your turn, you may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Exile target spell you control. You may cast it without paying its mana cost.
Choose target creature. If its controller owns a card in exile that shares a name with it, exile it. If a card in its controller's graveyard shares a name with it, destroy it.

Discover 0. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 0 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]

Haste
Whenever Elite Eyeblade deals combat damage, put two -1/-1 counters on it.

When Eye of Standardization enters, you gain 1 life.
When Eye of Standardization leaves the battlefield, if it didn't die, you gain 1 life.

Conversion creature
You may cast this spell for {1}{W}. If you do, it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next phase.
When Explainitor Directive enters and whenever it attacks, if its not a token, create a token that's a copy of it.

Conversion creature
Search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.

When Eye of Teaching enters, surveil 1.
When Eye of Teaching leaves the battlefield, if it didn't die, surveil 1.

Conversion creature
You may cast this spell for {1}{U}. If you do, it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next phase.
Flying
When Explainitor Sphinx enters and whenever it attacks, draw a card.

Conversion creature
Scry 1, then draw a card.

Conversion permanent
Whenever Elite Explainitor attacks, you may put onto the battlefield from your hand a card that shares a name with a card that left the battlefield this turn.
As an additional cost to cast this spell, behold white and/or blue. [i](To behold a color, choose a permanent you control of that color or reveal a card of that color from your hand.)[/i]

Haste
When Eye Sculpture enters, exile the top card of your library. You may cast it.
Discard a card: Eye Sculpture becomes a 2/1 creature until end of turn.

Hexproof, indestructible
{T}: Discover 0. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 0 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
If you control another land, sacrifice Explainitor Stronghold.

Affinity for Lotuses, affinity for Lotuses [i](This spell costs {2} less to cast for each Lotus you control.)[/i]
[+2]: Exile target permanent.
[-3]: Return target Lotus from your graveyard to your hand.
[-12]: Create Avatar of Eternity, a 24/24 colorless Eldrazi Avatar creature token with indestructible and annihilator 6. [i](Whenever that creature attacks, defending player sacrifices six permanents.)[/i]

{T}: You gain life equal to half the amount of life you've lost this turn, rounded up.
